name: Witch's Curse (NoriKak)
description:
An extremely short game I put together to learn a bit more about GB Studio :)

A weird hut appeared in the woods next to your town, just like the elderly told the newer generations about. As everyone thought it was a silly story the cycle of the curse is about to affect the entire town (who is not exactly caring). Since no one thinks this is a real problem, it's up to you to stop the cycle and break the curse!
